price: Dia (Yūsuf) berkata, "Pada hari ini tak ada cercaan terhadap kamu, mudah-mudahan Allah mengampuni (kamu) dan Dia adalah Maha Penyayang di antara para penyayang".
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَثۡرِيبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ يَغۡفِرُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā tathrība ʿalaykumu al-yawma yaghfiru al-lahu lakum wahuwa arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
